Articles.Content: The Game crashes before getting to the main menu screen. One part is causing crashes and it wont stop. I have tried 15 times and the same part crashes the game.

Hi McGillicutty815, please [**read this thread**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92228-Known-Issues-Self-Help) and [**read this thread**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide), then provide your KSP.log, output\_log and dxdiag.

Thank you.
